turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hello. how can i assist you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. Can I get four large pizzas from Bella Luna, please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, 4 large pizzas it is. what did you want on those?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Just pineapple, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you want pineapple on all 4?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what kind of crust did you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thin crust, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok. so you want 4 large pizzas all with thin crust and, all with pineapple.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: is that right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That is correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what an interesting order. anyway, the total is $65.39.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What an interesting price. Thank you for confirming, it will be all for me today. Yes, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you want me to place the order now?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great. i've placed the order. it'll be ready for pick up in 25 mins.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: do you need anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh, that is all. Thank you very much Google pod. You are so helpful.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok glad to help.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay.
